articles.title: What a Glacial River Reveals About the Greenland Ice Sheet - NASA
articles.description: With data from a 2016 expedition, scientists supported by NASA are shedding more light into the complex processes under the Greenland Ice Sheet that control how fast its glaciers slide toward the ocean and contribute to sea level rise.
